meanings.definition: The act of making something plastic or giving it plastic qualities.
meanings.sent1: The plasticizations of the toy made it bend easily.
meanings.sent2: The plasticizations of the container allowed it to be reshaped.
meanings.sent3: The plasticizations of the clay turned it into a funny-looking creature.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity had a plasticizations effect on the project, molding it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The plasticizations of the material transformed it into a colorful sculpture.

meanings.definition: The process of treating a material with plasticizers to make it more flexible or moldable.
meanings.sent1: After the plasticizations, the rubber became stretchy.
meanings.sent2: The plasticizations of the fabric allowed it to drape beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The plasticizations of the dough made it easier to shape into funny animals.
meanings.sent4: His guidance had a plasticizations effect on the team, making them more adaptable.
meanings.sent5: The plasticizations of the clay made it as pliable as putty.
